book.synopsis: Discusses the case of a pediatric nurse who was killing her young patients and a hospital administration that looked the other way, until a few small-town physicians brought her to justice
book.title_long: The Death Shift: The True Story of Nurse Genene and the Texas Baby Murders
book.dimensions: Height: 5 inches, Length: 7 inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 1 inches
